paper_abstract: Based on a detailed analysis for the one-dimensional intrinsic mode function, a model of the bidimensional intrinsic mode function is found firstly. Then a new bidimensional empirical mode decomposition algorithm is developed by using the Radon transform. The existing methods have to locate the maxima and minima in a bidimensional function, and further, produce bidimensional envelopes. Those are usually hard for a real two-dimensional function. The proposed algorithm successfully avoids these difficulties. Experiments show encouraging results.
paper_title: A NEW BIDIMENSIONAL EMPIRICAL MODE DECOMPOSITION BY USING RADON TRANSFORM
